summary: An FBI internal email from July 29, 2020, requesting assistance for Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) related to the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation. The email seeks available agents from the NADP (likely New York Division) to assist with this high-profile case.

persons.name: Tracy
persons.context: Email is copied to Tracy for visibility regarding the request for assistance on the Epstein/Maxwell case.

events.title: FBI request for assistance on Epstein/Maxwell case
events.description: FBI Squad C-20 (VCAC/HT) sends an internal email requesting assistance from available agents for the ongoing Epstein/Maxwell investigation.

keyFacts: The FBI's Squad C-20, focused on VCAC/HT (likely Violent Crimes Against Children/Human Trafficking), was actively working on the Epstein/Maxwell case as of July 2020.
The email indicates the investigation was considered a 'high profile case' and a 'unique opportunity' for agents.
The request for assistance suggests the investigation was ongoing and potentially resource-intensive at that time.
